thread.title: Pramod Mittal, Delhi
thread.title_full: Lenskart reviewed by Pramod Mittal, Delhi

author: Pramod Mittal, Delhi
title: Pramod Mittal, Delhi
text: I found it easy, customer friendly and excellent service. However, can be improved by more faster delivery and little fewer fluctuations in its price tags. Because if a person doesn't know much about coupons/Discounts can found it very costly. Because in actually the frame cost doesn't worth with MRP with which they are tagged however after applying offers/coupons they give the affordable range.
